description:
When you’re cruising down mixed use pathways or reminding others that the bike lane might not be the best place for a stroll, a bell is a beautiful thing. Tool-free installation and an attention getting DING, make this bell a great addition to your 2-wheeled transport.

  • Tool-free installation makes it easy to swap between bikes
  • Fits 22.2 - 31.8mm bars
name: 49N DLX Humdinger QR Bell
